message: Welcome! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product. With an 80% chance of being superior in every way, this item is guaranteed to exceed your expectations. Invest in excellence today!
I'd like to pass on this one. I'd like to see some data on the products before making a decision.

So far, we've sold a significant number of high-quality items, with an average of 8 out of 10 products meeting our high standards.
